name: Your Call Football
description:
We’re blurring the lines between football and gaming – while revolutionizing both. YCF allows you, the fans, to vote on all offensive plays, in real time, during a live professional football game.

This is the world’s only football competition where fans can show off their play-calling prowess while competing for multiple weekly cash prizes – all right from their phones. Over $70,000 will be awarded to the top YCF play callers over the four-game series. And if you prove you’re an X’s and O’s genius and call the PERFECT game*, you could win $1 Million.

The YCF season kicks off with live games in Jacksonville, FLA on February 25th. You can’t win if you don't play. Get in the game today.

• A Real-Life Video Game: Real teams. Real games. But all the play-calling power is in your hands.

• Fan Play-Calling: Download the app and vote in real time on coach-selected plays. The play with the most fan votes gets run on the field.

• Compete for Cash Prizes: Earn points for good calls. Play against your friends and other fans in head-to-head contests and leagues. With multiple chances to win each quarter, fans will take home over $70k this season.

• $1 Million Payday: If you prove to be the ultimate play-caller and call the PERFECT game in any one of Your Call Football’s games, you’ll hit the jackpot. Just choose the play that earns the most points each and every play and you’ll be the world’s first ever Million Dollar play-caller. It’s that simple.
